traits.name: Flurry of Blows (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: If the traveler has attacked this turn, it can make an additional unarmed strike as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shadow Arts (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: The traveler duplicates the effects of certain spells. As an action, it can cast darkness, darkvision, pass without trace, or silence without providing material components.

traits.name: Shadow Step
traits.desc: When the traveler is in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action it can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light and darkness. The traveler then has advantage on the fight melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While not wearing armor, the traveler's AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The traveler makes three attacks, two with its quarterstaff and one with its unarmed strike.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
